participant_1.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

participant_2.background: my pets name is charlie. i drive a 2015 honda civic. i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. my favourite food is pizza.

content.text: Hi there, i am playing with charlie, what are you doing
I am doing well. I just got back from my new job in pennsylvania
Nice, do you love your job. I drive civic to ma music studio
I do not. I am a pa. what do you do for a living?
I am a music producer. And you?
I live in pennsylvania. I am pregnant. my husband is a pa. do you read?
Not much, i like listening to music
I love listening to music. what kind of music do you like to read?
I like rap and i really love to eat pizza
pizza is my favorite. I love to read. do you have any hobbies?
Music , driving and playing with my pets are my hobbies
that sounds like a lot of fun. I like to listen to music
